assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: The course gives through lectures and seminars an overview of the formation of the Nordic language area as well as language situation today. The main focus is on the Scandinavian languages and their characteristic features.
description.et: Kursus annab loengute ja seminaride abil ülevaate Põhjamaade keelepiirkonna kujunemisest tänapäevani, keskendudes Skandinaavia keeltele ja nende iseloomulikele joontele.

objectives.en: The course gives a historical survey of the formation of the Nordic language area as well as language situation today, provides basic knowledge of Scandinavian languages, their classification and characteristic features.
objectives.et: Kursus annab ülevaate Põhjamaade keelepiirkonna kujunemisest ja tänapäevast, põhiteadmised Skandinaavia keeltest, nende liigitusest ja iseloomulikest joontest.

learning_outcomes.en: A student who has passed the course:
- has an overview of the main features and the historical background of the formation of Nordic language area as well as language situation today;
learning_outcomes.et: - tunneb Põhjamaade keelepiirkonna kujunemise ajalugu ja hetkeolukorda;

learning_outcomes.en: - knows the basic facts about the Scandinavian languages;
learning_outcomes.et: - on omandanud üldteadmised Skandinaavia keelte kohta;

learning_outcomes.en: - has an overview of the spreading of Scandinavian languages today;
learning_outcomes.et: - on omandanud ülevaate Skandinaavia keelte levikust tänapäeva maailmas;

learning_outcomes.en: - is able to identify the Scandinavian language in which a text was written.
learning_outcomes.et: - tunneb ära, millises Skandinaavia keeles on antud tekst.
